alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 10:01PM CST until March 10 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow-Covered and Slippery Roads Continue... .Snowfall reports through the evening so far have mostly been in the 2 to 5 inch range with some of the higher amounts in southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa. Snow will continue to diminish, however 1 to 2 inches of accumulation can be expected especially east of the Mississippi River. Snowfall totals are expected to range from 3 to 7 inches, with some locally higher amounts possible. Several spins outs, slide-offs and crashes have been reported this evening including I90 and I94. If traveling overnight, slow down and allow extra distance between you and the vehicle in front of you. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Dodge and Mower Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511mn.org for road conditions.
